document_data.name: The Folly and the Fall
document_data.author: [[Cagon Fegg]]
document_data.mainbody:
The Folly and the Fall'' was a tragedy describing the history of [[Thultanthar]]. Its four parts were: "Of lost [[Netheril]], that great Wizarding Empire in Humanity's Age of Wonder", "Of the great [[mage]] [[Karsus]]; His Brief and Terrible [[God]]hood, and the [[Karsus' Folly|Ruin He Wrought]]", "Of Netheril's Fall; A Thousand Years of [[Plane of Shadow|Shade]], and [[Shar]]'s Subversion", and "Of Netheril's Return, and its Shadow Falling Upon the Land".

The play was performed by the [[Sharptongue Travelling Troupe]], with the assistance of thaumaturges, in theaters around the [[Western Heartlands]], and was available for only a single season.

document_data.Rumors & Legends: When performed in the [[Everlight Theatre]] of [[Elturel]], the play was said to have sent the audience into chaos.
document_data.History: A copy of ''The Folly and the Fall's'' playbill could be found in the schoolhouse of [[Moonhaven]], as of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
